title: Dodgeball Ryze.
body:
So i've never really submitted one of these. and something similar has probably already been suggested, But has anybody ever thought of a Dodgeball Ryze skin. I think this would fit in with the possible reworks rito mentioned. about adjusting his Q to a skill shot?
You could have like a Passive buff that Read "If you can dodge a wrench" or something silly that counted the number of Q's you've landed on an enemy champion. I don't know what any of his other abilities could do. But i still think it would be hilarious all the same.

replies.body: simple fix dawaraven, change it to become another champion that uses balls, ori, or ahri, for example.
That would be a great skin, but pls no ryzer skins. If they make a ryze skin they have to rework him.

another ryze rework?

lel, he has been reworked like 3(or more) times
once....of actual reworks. everything else has been straight number changes.

That would be epic, as you can't dodge him lol.

I support this idea, really, +1.
